key.name: panel-box
key.description: Which panel box to display the indicators.

key.name: workspaces-before-active-position
key.description: Where to show, within the panel box, the indicators for workspaces before the active one. A value of "nothing" hides them.

key.name: workspaces-after-active-position
key.description: Where to show, within the panel box, the indicators for workspaces after the active one. A value of "nothing" hides them.

key.name: active-workspace-position
key.description: Where to show, within the panel box, the indicator for the active workspace. A value of "nothing" hides it.

key.name: active-workspace-style-pseudo-class
key.description: The CSS style pseudo class to be applied to the active workspace indicator.

key.name: icons-style-class
key.description: The CSS style class to be applied to the icons.

key.name: icons-maximum-amount
key.description: The maximum amount of window icons to display within each workspace indicator. A value of "nothing" removes the limit.

key.name: icons-per-application
key.description: Whether to group workspace icons by application.

key.name: workspace-numbers-position
key.description: Whether to display workspace numbers. A negative value appends to the end. A value of "nothing" hides them.
